cmake_minimum_required (VERSION 3.1)

include (ExternalProject)

set (CLIPP_EXTERNAL_PROJECT clipp-git)
message (${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
set (CLIPP_SOURCE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/${CLIPP_EXTERNAL_PROJECT}-prefix/src/${CLIPP_EXTERNAL_PROJECT}/)

ExternalProject_Add (
  ${CLIPP_EXTERNAL_PROJECT}
  GIT_REPOSITORY "https://github.com/muellan/clipp.git"
  GIT_TAG "master"
  UPDATE_COMMAND ""
  CONFIGURE_COMMAND ""
  BUILD_COMMAND ""
  INSTALL_COMMAND ""
  )

set (CLIPP_EXTERNAL_PROJECT ${CLIPP_EXTERNAL_PROJECT} PARENT_SCOPE)
set (CLIPP_INCLUDE_DIRS ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/${CLIPP_EXTERNAL_PROJECT}-prefix/src/${CLIPP_EXTERNAL_PROJECT}/include PARENT_SCOPE)
